Apa saja pantangan makanan penderita stroke? Makanan yang mengandung kolesterol dan lemak jenuh tinggi, seperti: mentega, keju dan minyak kelapa. 

 Kolesterol dan lemak jenuh juga berasal dari produk hewani, termasuk daging dan susu. Batasi penggunaan garam dalam masakan Anda. Hal ini dikarenakan garam membuat tubuh kita menahan banyak air, yang akan meningkatkan tekanan darah Anda. Seperti yang kita ketahui tekanan darah tinggi sangat berisiko menyebabkan datangnya serangan stroke. Anda harus batasi penggunaan garam di bawah 1.500 miligram per hari. 

 Pantangan makanan bagi penderita stroke berikutnya adalah segala jenis makanan yang mengandung lemak trans seperti : kerupuk, keripik, margarin, mentega, es krim, biskuit, popcorn dan setiap makanan yang dipanggang dan digoreng. Makanan yang mengandung pengawet kimia seperti sodium nitrat dan nitrit yang sering dijumpai pada daging asap dan makanan kaleng. Karena makanan jenis ini terbukti merusak pembuluh darah Anda, yang bisa meningkatkan risiko serangan stroke. 

 Makanan dan minuman bersoda menurut penelitian yang dipresentasikan dalam American Stroke Association’s International Conference dapat meningkatkan risiko stroke hingga 48 persen. Makanan yang mengandung kadar gula tinggi, karena gula dapat menyebabkan obesitas dimana obesitas dapat menyebabkan penyumbatan pembuluh darah sebagai penyebab utama serangan stroke. Alkohol juga merupakan pantangan penderita Stroke, karena alkohol dapat mempengaruhi tekanan darah.
Ps : You can check result detail on \"Treatment\" Page
Value must greater than %s and less than %s !
Data not defined, insert data first !
This app is run in limited mode. Please login to get full functionality.

Stroke is a condition that occurs when the blood supply to the brain is cut off by a blockage or rupture of blood vessels, resulting in the death of cells in certain parts of the brain.

Symptoms of Stroke 

Remember the following symptoms of a stroke in order to take appropriate action.
1. How to talk to the patients is not clear or garbled, and even some patients who can not talk at all, although they are awake
2. Eyes and mouth on one side of the patient's face looks down 
3.Lengan patient suffered paralysis as a stroke, because it they are not able to lift one or both arms

Cause of Stroke

1. Obesity
Excess body weight can cause the sufferer will experience problems in the flow of blood. Number of fat in the body can be experienced in patients with obesity, and obesity is caused as a result of eating foods that contain high fat, so fat that accumulates in the body will also be a roadblock for blood.
2. Cigarette
Smoking may be a cause of stroke because the content is owned cigarette can make the brain is not getting enough blood flow. therefore the risk of active smokers is very high for the sick stroke.
3.Alcohol
Drink beverages containing alcohol can raise blood pressure and make blood flow in the brain ceases until nerve pain so that the brain is interrupted stroke will experience a moment in time.
4. High cholesterol
High cholesterol levels and will not heal impede the flow of blood, because cholesterol is so much in the body will shrink the blood vessels, thus having high cholesterol can lead to stroke pain.
5. Genetics
Genetic factors also can lead to stroke, the family suffered a stroke can also make other family members will also have suffered a stroke as well when not in keeping with his good health.
6. Blood sugar 
Blood sugar can causes a stroke can also be caused by having high blood sugar. does not control blood sugar levels in the body also cause strokes over time. Therefore keep your blood sugar stable is also very important
This page describe overview of stroke disease and its common treatment.
This page contains a form to detect stroke. There are five required data that is age, cholesterol, HDL, LDL, and triglyceride.
This page displays all user\'s stroke data previously recorded.
This page displays all user\'s stroke data previously recorded in chart way.
This page display stroke treatment according to its data.
This page describe how to use this app.
An application of Lab KC FILKOM UB containing various intelligence applications to solve existing problems

A stroke patient dietary restrictions?

Foods that contain cholesterol and saturated fat, such as butter, cheese and coconut oil. Cholesterol and saturated fats are also derived from animal products, including meat and dairy.
Limit the use of salt in your cooking. This is because the salt makes the body hold a lot of water, which will increase your blood pressure. As we know high blood pressure is very risky cause the arrival of a stroke. You should limit salt intake below 1,500 milligrams per day.
Dietary restrictions for patients following stroke is any kind of food containing trans fat such as: crackers, chips, margarine, butter, ice cream, biscuits, popcorn and any baked goods and fried.
Foods that contain chemical preservatives such as sodium nitrate and nitrite are often found in smoked meats and canned food. Because these foods shown to damage your blood vessels, which can increase the risk of stroke.
Food and soft drinks, according to research presented at the American Stroke Association's International Conference may increase the risk of stroke by 48 percent.
Foods that contain high levels of sugar, because sugar can cause obesity where obesity can lead to blockage of blood vessels as a major cause of stroke.
Alcohol is also a taboo Stroke sufferers, because alcohol can affect blood pressure.
